meanings.definition: Glasses or lenses worn to improve vision or protect the eyes.
meanings.sent1: She always wears her eyewear when reading to see the words clearly.
meanings.sent2: The optometrist recommended new eyewear for better vision.
meanings.sent3: The detective put on his eyewear to spot clues more easily.
meanings.sent4: Her eyewear acted like a shield against the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorful frames of her eyewear made her look stylish and smart.

meanings.definition: Any device worn over the eyes for protection or to enhance vision.
meanings.sent1: Construction workers wear eyewear to shield their eyes from debris.
meanings.sent2: The virtual reality headset is a type of advanced eyewear.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut's space helmet was his special eyewear for the mission.
meanings.sent4: His night vision goggles were his secret eyewear for stealth missions.
meanings.sent5: The scuba diver's mask was his essential eyewear for exploring the ocean depths.
